question: My sister is 18 now and she was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes 4 years ago. She is on insulin.  She has a regular problem of abdominal distention. Whenever she eats, either less or large, she gets trouble with her stomach, pain while walking in stomach, constipation type symptoms. Number of visits had been made to different gastroenterologists, but none of them was able to help her out with this problem. Kindly suggest regarding this.
title: Abdominal distention in type 1 diabetic
